description: PURL type for Maven JARs and related artifacts.

repository.note: The Maven Central repository is the public repository for Apache Maven packages. This repository is also mirrored at https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/. Use the standard repository_url qualifier to point to another repository

namespace_definition.note: The group id is the namespace.

name_definition.note: The artifact id is the name.

qualifiers_definition.description: The maven classifier as defined in the POM documentation.

The maven type as defined in the POM documentation. Note that Maven uses a concept / coordinate called packaging which does not map directly 1:1 to a file extension. In this use case, we need to construct a link to one of many possible artifacts. Maven itself uses type in a dependency declaration when needed to disambiguate between them.
